name: Stormfall: Saga of Survival
description:
Survive, explore, and master swordcraft and sorcery in this free-to-play fantasy survival MMORPG set in the high-fantasy Stormfall universe.

Once a great lord of Stormfall, you have been betrayed. Banished, you now face a life of exile to the Eastern Marches - a desolate land of snowy peaks, ancient magic, and forgotten ruins. You must fight off starvation, build shelter, and battle corrupted beasts, bandits, and fellow exiles.

There will be a time for redemption, but first…

You must survive.

Download now and join the fight!

*FEATURES*

FIGHT YOUR ENEMIES
You must rise again to vanquish your enemies and carve out a place of your own. Craft and loot deadly weapons to defend yourself against forest beasts and corrupted monsters. Be ready for a fight.

BUILD AND CRAFT
Use whatever you can find to protect yourself. Learn how to craft new weapons, tools, and armor along your journey. Live with nature and replenish your supplies through hunting and gathering. Build and improve your shelter to secure your corner of the Eastern Marches.

DISCOVER THE ARCANE
Learn the secrets of magic. Craft runes that will strengthen your weapons and give additional boosts to your power. Master the arcane arts to wield them against those who stand against you.

EXPLORE THE UNKNOWN
The dark forests and snowy mountains of the Eastern Marches are yours – if you are brave enough. Discover the secrets of ancient ruins, scavenge supplies from across the land, and discover new regions of the wildlands.

RESIST THE CURSE
You are not immune to the darkness. You must cleanse yourself of its influence, and learn the secrets of a goddess that can protect you from it.

TAME THE WILD
You will have to become one with the wilds to survive. Tame a horse to help you travel, or take on the brute power of a wyvern. True beastmasters can even attempt the ultimate challenge - legends say dragons still haunt these lands...

DEFEAT THE DARKNESS
The creatures above ground are not the only challenge awaiting you. In the darkest reaches of the ruins lie the most malicious of evils. Defeat them, and loot some of the most valuable treasures in the Eastern Marches.

YOU ARE NOT ALONE
That curling smoke on the next mountain means only one thing - you are not alone. How you deal with other exiles is up to you.


PLEASE NOTE:
• Items are available for purchase in this game. Some paid items may not be refundable depending on the type of item.
• Stormfall: Saga of Survival is available in English and Russian.
